Curriculum

The Open Curriculum for Learning Web Development

Terms to Know

Estimated Time: 1-2 hrs

Assignment:
  1. Take a look at this list of term definitions and make sure you have at least a competant understanding of each one (click on it to bring up the full definition). Don't skip this and assume you know it all -- there will be at least a few that are worth nailing down. Flashcards help.

Roadmap

  1. MY URL IS: http://theodinproject.github.io/curriculum
  2. Introduction
  3. About Web Developers
  4. Installations
  5. Pair Programming
  6. Web Development 101
  7. Ruby
    • Basic Ruby Project 1
    • Basic Ruby Project 2
    • File I/O Project
    • OOP Project
    • Recursion Project
    • Data Structures and Algorithms Project
    • Testing Project
    • Ruby on the Web Project
    • Ruby Final Project
  8. Git (Coming Soon!)
  9. Databases (Coming Soon!)
  10. Ruby on Rails (Coming Soon!)
  11. HTML / CSS (Coming Soon!)
  12. Javascript (Coming Soon!)
  13. Tying it All Together (Coming Soon!)
